title: Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile", 1919
medium: Brush and gouache, black chalk or pastel, pen and brown ink on tracing paper, lined
inscribed: Lower margin, right in pen and black ink: Pou 3702 / in pen and red ink: 27.49.1
creditline: Gift of Herman A. Elsberg on the Fortieth Anniversary of the Museum
description: Vertical sheet illustrating four bouquets arranged in a diamond; the upper and lower of these is rendered in graphite, while the others are polychrome containing orange, red, amethyst, yellow and turquoise flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile", 1919.
1919. Brush and gouache, black chalk or pastel, pen and brown ink on tracing paper, lined. Gift of Herman A. Elsberg on the Fortieth Anniversary of the Museum. 1937-63-23.
